Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.
This unit is considered a Heritor Unit and is protected from offensive Heritor Operations and abilities.
该单位被视为继承者单位，能够受到攻击型继承者行动和技能的保护。
Forcefully extract essence from the target and feed on it.
强制吸收并吞食目标体内的精华。
Each hit heals this unit for {LifeSteal}[hp/].
每次命中都会治疗该单位 {LifeSteal}[hp/]。
Attempt to seize control of target non-Mindless, non-Hero unit. If successful, this unit transfers to and becomes the possessed unit, even after combat.
试图控制目标非无意识、非英雄单位。如果成功，该单位即使在战斗结束后也会成为被控制的单位。

{MindPossessionChance}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to [abilityred]Mind Control[/abilityred] target non-Mindless non-Hero, tier I or II enemy unit. On failure, the unit is [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {StunDuration}[turn/] instead.
有 {MindPossessionChance}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率[abilityred]心灵控制[/abilityred]目标非无意识单位或 1 阶或 2 阶敌方单位。如果失败，该敌方单位将被[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]，持续 {StunDuration}[turn/]。
This unit has been possessed by an ancient Es'Teq mind and has switched its allegiance. It is immune to morale effects.
该单位被古代埃斯特克的意志所控制，改变了原先的信仰。免疫士气效果。
This unit gains +{ExperienceBonus}[xp/] at the end of combat for each stack of [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] it has.
在战斗结束后，该单位每叠加一层 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，可使自身获得 +{ExperienceBonus}[xp/]。
Connect to the Essence of target enemy, draining them and dealing entropy damage.
连接目标敌人的精华，汲取他们的生命精华并造成混沌伤害。
Transfers [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] from the caster to the target friendly unit, restoring its action points. Only the required number of charges will be transferred.
将施法者的 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]转移至目标友方单位，恢复其操作点数。只会转移需求数量的充能。

This unit converts all of its [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] and gives them as shields to target unit. That unit gains {shields}[shield/] for {turns}[turn/] for each [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] consumed.
该单位将所有的 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]转化为目标单位的护盾。该单位每消耗一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]就会获得 {shields}[shield/]，持续 {turns}[turn/]。
Unit has {Baseshield}[shield/] plus an additional {shield}[shield/] per stack.
该单位拥有 {Baseshield}[shield/]，此外每层还会额外获得 {shield}[shield/]。
This unit can carry one additional [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue].
该单位可额外携带 1 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。
The unit triggers an entropic pulse at the target, damaging it and draining its essence.
单位对目标释放一阵混沌脉冲，造成伤害并汲取其精华。
每层 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]造成 {damage}[damageentropy/] 伤害。
This unit connects to target friendly unit that cannot form connections itself.[br/]Both units gain [abilityblue]Communion[/abilityblue] which allows them to be targeted by certain abilities.
该单位连接至本身不能形成连接的目标友方单位。[br/]两个单位都将获得[abilityblue]通灵[/abilityblue]，从而可以成为某些特定技能的目标。
Breaks all Essence links connecting this unit to other units through [abilityblue]Communion[/abilityblue].
通过[abilityblue]通灵[/abilityblue]，断开该单位与其他单位的所有精华连接。
This unit is linked to another unit, allowing them to be targeted by certain abilities.
该单位与另一单位相连，可以成为某些特定技能的目标。

The unit consumes all [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue], healing all linked units and the Ark itself through [abilityblue]Communion[/abilityblue] for {hp}[hp/] plus {hp}[hp/] for each [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] consumed.
单位消耗所有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，通过[abilityblue]通灵[/abilityblue]治疗所有连接单位和方舟自身 {hp}[hp/]，每消耗一个[abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，便可额外治疗{hp}[hp/]。

The unit consumes all [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue]. Units linked through [abilityblue]Communion[/abilityblue] and the Ark itself deal additional {damage}%[damageEntropy/] per charge consumed for {turn}[turn/].
单位消耗所有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，每消耗一个充能，所有连接单位和方舟自身便可通过[abilityblue]通灵[/abilityblue]额外造成 {damage}%[damageEntropy/]，持续 {turn}[turn/]。
This unit deals {damage}%[damageentropy/] per stack of Sacrament of Decay.
该单位每叠加有一层“腐化圣礼”，就可额外造成 {damage}%[damageentropy/]。

This unit can have one additional [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue]. At the start of each turn in Tactical Combat, this unit gains {EssenceCharge}[abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue].
该单位可额外拥有 1 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。在每个战术战斗回合开始时，该单位获得 {EssenceCharge}[abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。
Unit forcefully drains Essence from target enemy unit.
单位强制汲取目标敌方单位的精华。
Consume all [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] and unleash a powerful Essence blast, damaging all enemy units in a {range} hex radius.
消耗所有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]并释放一阵强大的精华冲击波，对 {range} 单元格范围内的所有敌方单位造成伤害。
Deals +{ExtraDamage}[DamageEntropy/] per [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] consumed and applies {stack} stacks of [abilityred]Entropic Decay[/abilityred].
每消耗一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，便造成 +{ExtraDamage}[DamageEntropy/] 并施加 {stack} 层 [abilityred]混沌衰败[/abilityred]。

Consumes all [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] to resurrect target non-Hero, non-tier 4 unit until end of combat. The unit resurrects with +{healing}%[hp/] for each [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] consumed.
消耗所有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]复活目标非英雄、非 4 阶单位，持续至战斗结束。每消耗一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，单位在复活时便拥有 +{healing}%[hp/]。
This unit is the vessel to an ancient Es'Teq mind.
该单位是某个古老的埃斯特克灵魂的容器。
Consumes up to 5[essencecharge/] [abilityblue]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] and unleashes a disrupting burst of Essence to attempt to disable Mechanical units.
消耗最多 5 个 [essencecharge/][abilityblue]精华充能[/abilityblue]释放一阵破坏性的精华冲击波，尝试瘫痪机械单位。
Has a {chance}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {turn}[turn/] for each [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] consumed.
每消耗一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，就有 {chance}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率施加[abilityred]眩晕[/abilityred]，持续 {turn}[turn/]。
This unit can carry two additional [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue].
该单位可额外携带 2 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。

All attacks made by this unit have a {strength}[strengthEntropy/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Energy Drain[/abilityred] to the target and grant one [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] to this unit.[br/][br/]This buff lasts until the end of its next Tactical Combat.
该单位进行的所有攻击都有 {strength}[strengthEntropy/] 力量几率对目标施加[abilityred]能量干涸[/abilityred]，并赋予该单位一个[abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。[br/][br/]效果持续至下一次战术战斗结束。

All melee attacks made by the unit now have a {EnergyDrainChance}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Energy Drain[/abilityred] ({EnergyDrainSingleAttack}[strengthentropy/] strength chance on repeating attacks). On success, the caster gains an [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue], increasing the damage it deals.

该单位进行的所有近战攻击都有 {EnergyDrainChance}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率施加[abilityred]能量干涸[/abilityred]（重复攻击有 {EnergyDrainSingleAttack}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率）。如果成功，施法者获得一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]并提升造成的伤害。

Consumes all [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue], dealing {damage}[damageentropy/] to all adjacent units for each [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] consumed and staggers them.
消耗所有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，每消耗一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]就会对所有相邻单位造成 {damage}[damageentropy/]伤害并使其动摇。

Whenever this unit is hit with an attack, there is a {EnergyDrainChance}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Energy Drain[/abilityred] to the attacker. If successful, this unit gains an [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue].[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of Incarnation can be active at any time.[/productioncol]

该单位受到攻击时，有 {EnergyDrainChance}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率对攻击者施加[abilityred]能量干涸[/abilityred]。如果成功，该单位将获得一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。[br/][br/][productioncol]同时只能激活一种化身。[/productioncol]
Gives the unit a conduit to channel their Essence through, inflicting damage at range.
给予该单位一根导管引导其精华流动，从而在远距离造成伤害。
The unit consumes all [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] and channels them into a blast of Essence, dealing damage in a {range} hex radius area of effect.
该单位消耗所有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]并将其引导至精华冲击波，对 {range} 个受影响的单元格范围造成伤害。
每个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]造成 {ExtraDamage}[DamageEntropy/] 伤害。
Empower a Quintessence Ark to unlock more powerful abilities. [abilityblue]Communion[/abilityblue] can now link with up to {units} units.
强化精髓方舟解锁更强大的能力。[abilityblue]通灵[/abilityblue]现在可以连接最多 {units} 个单位。

Merge the mind of an Es'Teq Lord with the unit. Whenever this unit gains an [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue], they heal for {health}[hp/].[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of Incarnation can be active at any time.[/productioncol]
将埃斯特克领主的意志与单位融合。该单位获得 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]时，能够治疗 {health}[hp/]。[br/][br/][productioncol]同时只能激活一种化身。[/productioncol]
Bestow Es'Teq Essence on a unit. Target friendly unit gains their maximum number of [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue].
赋予单位埃斯特克精华，目标友方单位将获得其最大数量的 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。

Condemn an enemy in the name of the Es'Teq, transforming them to a Drained unit. Target enemy non-Hero Infantry unit has a {StrengthChance}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to gain [abilityred]Condemned[/abilityred] until end of battle. Condemned units have -{moraledebuff}[anger/] and -{EntropyDebuff}[defenseentropy/].[br/][br/]When a unit with [abilityred]Condemned[/abilityred] dies, it transforms into a Drained unit under the caster's control. This unit remains after battle.

以埃斯特克之名谴责敌人，将他们转化为枯萎者单位。目标敌方非无意识步兵单位有 {StrengthChance}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率遭到[abilityred]谴责[/abilityred]，持续至战斗结束。谴责单位将 -{moraledebuff}[anger/] 和 -{EntropyDebuff}[defenseentropy/]。[br/][br/][abilityred]谴责[/abilityred]单位死亡时不会留下尸体，而是会召唤出一个由施法者控制的枯萎者单位。枯萎者单位将永久存在，且在战斗结束时也不会被移除。[br/]无法以英雄或指挥官为目标。

This unit is [abilityred]Condemned[/abilityred]. They have -{moraledebuff}[anger/] and -{EntropyDebuff}[defenseentropy/]. If the unit dies, instead of leaving behind a corpse, a Drained unit is summoned under the enemy's control. This unit is permanent, and will not be removed at the end of battle.
该单位被[abilityred]谴责[/abilityred]，获得 -{moraledebuff}[anger/] 和 -{EntropyDebuff}[defenseentropy/]。单位死亡不会留下尸体，而是会召唤出一个由敌方控制的枯萎者单位。枯萎者单位将永久存在，且在战斗结束时也不会被移除。

By implanting an ancient Es'Teq mind, a consciousness, into a freshly-deceased body, they can be brought back to life.[br/]Target friendly non-Mechanical, non-Hero, tier I, II or III corpse is revived with {Health}%[hp/]. In addition, it gains +{Morale}[happiness/] until end of combat.
将一个古老的埃斯特克灵魂和意识植入刚刚死亡的尸体，使阵亡的单位复活。[br/]目标友方非机械、非英雄、1 阶、2 阶或 3 阶单位的尸体复活，拥有 {Health}%[hp/] 并获得 +{Morale}[happiness/]，效果持续至战斗结束。

Spread Essence throughout units, granting them [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] and increasing their morale. All friendly units in combat gain {ChargeAmount} [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] and +{Morale}[happiness/] until end of combat.
在单位间传播精华，赋予这些单位 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]并提高他们的士气。所有战斗中的友方单位获得 {ChargeAmount} 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]和 +{Morale}[happiness/]，效果持续至战斗结束。

Target the Essence in a unit to trigger a revitalizing reaction, healing them. Target friendly unit heals for {health}[hp/]. If the unit has an [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/Abilityblue], it is instead healed for {HealthEssence}[hp/], dispelled of all hostile status effects and loses {charges} [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/Abilityblue].

触发单位体内精华的复苏反应来治疗单位。目标友方单位治疗 {health}[hp/]。如果友方单位拥有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/Abilityblue]，则能够恢复 {HealthEssence}[hp/]，驱散所有负面状态效果并失去 {charges} 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/Abilityblue]。

Unleash an Es'Teq mind in an attempt to take possession of an enemy unit. Target non-Mindless, non-Mechanical enemy unit has a {Strength}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to switch allegiance and gain [abilityblue]Es'Teq Possession[/abilityblue] until end of battle. On failure, the unit is [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] instead.[br/][br/]Should a unit with [abilityblue]Es'Teq Possession[/abilityblue] die, the Es'Teq Mind escapes and has a {StrengthJump}[strengthentropy/] strength chance spread to another viable enemy unit within {range} hexes.

释放埃斯特克的灵魂占据一个敌方单位。目标敌方非无意识和非机械单位有 {Strength}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率叛变并获得 [abilityblue]埃斯特克控制[/abilityblue]，效果持续至战斗结束。如果失败，该单位会被[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]。[br/][br/]如果拥有[abilityblue]埃斯特克控制[/abilityblue]的单位死亡，埃斯特克的灵魂将会逃走并有 {StrengthJump}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率传播至 {range} 个单元格范围内的另一个可视敌方单位体内。

An Es'Teq mind is possessing this unit. On death of this unit, the Es'Teq mind escapes and attempts to possess another unit. The mind has a {StrengthJump}[strengthentropy/] strength chance spread to a non-Mindless, non-Mechanical enemy unit within {range} hexes and possess them, switching their allegiance and granting them [abilityblue]Es'Teq Possession[/abilityblue] until end of combat. On failure, the unit is [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] instead.

一个埃斯特克的灵魂正在控制该单位。该单位死亡时，体内的埃斯特克灵魂将会逃走并试图控制另一个单位。埃斯特克灵魂有 {StrengthJump}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率传播至 {range} 个单元格范围内的非无意识和非机械敌方单位体内，使其叛变并获得[abilityblue]埃斯特克控制[/abilityblue]，效果持续到战斗结束。如果失败，该敌方单位将会被[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]。
An Es'Teq mind is possessing this unit. This mind is weakened, and will not attempt to possess another unit should this unit die.
一个埃斯特克的灵魂正在控制该单位。灵魂变得虚弱，当该单位死亡时，灵魂将不会尝试控制另一个单位。

Bring forth a violent barrage of pure Essence, tearing through enemies. All enemy units within a {range} hex radius area of effect take {damage}[damageentropy/], lose {morale}[happiness/] and have a {strength}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to gain [abilityred]Entropic Decay[/abilityred].
制造一阵猛烈的纯净精华弹幕撕裂敌人。{range} 个受影响单元格范围内所有敌方单位受到 {damage}[damageentropy/] 伤害，失去 {morale}[happiness/] 并有 {strength}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率获得[abilityred]混沌衰败[/abilityred]。

Target friendly army is healed for {health}%[hp/] and all units gain {buff} stack of [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] in combat. This lasts for {turn}[turn/] strategic map turn.
目标友方军队治疗 {health}%[hp/] 且所有单位获得 {buff} 层 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，持续 {turn}[turn/] 个策略地图回合。
We've successfully blessed our army! They are revitalized and strengthened by our efforts.
我们成功祝福了我们的军队！他们得到了复苏并获得了强化。
Target enemy army takes {damage}% of their current [hp/] in damage and all units have -{EntropicRes}[defenseentropy/] for {turn}[turn/] on the world map.
在世界地图上，目标敌方军队受到其当前 [hp/] {damage}% 的伤害且所有单位获得 -{EntropicRes}[defenseentropy/]，持续 {turn}[turn/]。
We have successfully cursed the enemy army! They are damaged and weakened by our efforts.
我们成功诅咒了敌方军队！他们受到了伤害并且变弱了。
All [population/] in target enemy colony now produce {resourceincomereduction} income in the resource slot they occupy and the colony suffers from -{Unhappiness}[anger/] for {turns}[turn/].
目标敌方殖民内的所有 [population/] 在其占领的资源槽位中产出 {resourceincomereduction} 的收益 ，并且殖民地遭受 -{Unhappiness}[anger/]，持续 {turns}[turn/]。
The Es'Teq minds are successfully haunting the enemy colony. Their colonist income is reduced and their happiness is negatively affected.
埃斯特克的灵魂成功纠缠住了敌方殖民地。敌方移住民的收益减少，幸福值也受到了负面影响。
The Es'Teq minds were unsuccessful in haunting the enemy colony and have been driven away. The attempt has left the colony in a state of civil unrest.
埃斯特克的灵魂被赶走了，未能成功纠缠住敌方殖民地，但这次尝试造成了殖民地居民的不安。

Send in Siphon Priests to attempt to persuade enemy colonists to switch allegiance, before converting them into energy. [br/][br/]Target enemy colony has a {chance}% chance to lose a colonist every [turn/], for {turns}[turn/]. For each colonist lost this way, the caster gains {energy}[energy/].
派遣虹吸牧师试图说服敌方移住民叛变，然后将他们转化成能量。[br/][br/]目标敌方殖民地每 [turn/] 有 {chance}% 几率失去一个移住民，持续 {turns}[turn/]。每失去一个移住民，施法者获得 {energy}[energy/]。

Target enemy colony loses {colonists}[population/], and {summons} Drained units are summoned under your control adjacent to the Colony Center. Additionally, an [abilityred]Essence Gash[/abilityred] hazard is created in the sector.
目标敌方殖民地失去 {colonists}[population/]，并召唤 {summons} 个由你控制的枯萎者单位至殖民地中心附近。此外，在区域中制造一个[abilityred]精华裂缝[/abilityred]灾害。
Essence Gash is a fissure, a canyon in the ground, that is filled with Essence. It is considered a hazard, and bad for the colony in the same sector.

The power of the Es'Teq has succesfully smited the enemy colony! Some of their colonists have been leached of Essence and have converted into [abilityblue]Drained[/abilityblue] to join our cause. An [abilityred]Essence Gash[/abilityred] has opened up in the sector as a side effect.
埃斯特克的力量已成功打击了敌人的殖民地！一些移住民已经被榨干了精华并转化成了[abilityblue]枯萎者[/abilityblue]加入到了我们的事业。此外，还在该区域中打开了一道[abilityred]精华裂缝[/abilityred]。
We have failed to bring the power of the Es'Teq to bear on the colony, though the attempt has left the colony in a state of civil unrest.
我们未能使用埃斯特克的力量成功打击敌方殖民地，但这次尝试造成了殖民地居民的不安。
As in Iconoclast; a destroyer of images used in religious worship. But then with Technology

Rally your forces in a crusade against the wickedness of machine intelligence.[br/][br/]Against Mechanical and Integrated units, all friendly units gain +{Damage}% damage and have a {chance}[strengthentropy/] strength chance ({RepeatingChance}[StrengthEntropy/] for repeating attacks) to inflict [abilityred]Entropic Decay[/abilityred].
集结一支远征军部队，向邪恶的智能机器宣战。[br/][br/]对抗机械和融合单位时，所有友方单位获得 +{Damage}% 伤害，并有 {chance}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率（多次攻击有 {RepeatingChance}[StrengthEntropy/] 几率）施加[abilityred]混沌衰败[/abilityred]。

Infuse your Drained with Essence, forming a divine legion that cannot be stopped.[br/][br/]All Drained units gain [abilityblue]Essence Infusion[/abilityblue], granting them +{shield}[shield/], [abilityblue]Resurgence[/abilityblue] and allowing them to carry {charges} additional [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue].
将精华注入枯萎者，构建一支不可阻挡的神圣军团。[br/][br/]所有枯萎者单位获得[abilityblue]精华灌注[/abilityblue]，获得 +{shield}[shield/] 和[abilityblue]复苏[/abilityblue]，并且还可额外携带 {charges} 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。
Resurgance is a unit ability that brings units back to life after successful combat.
Through Essence Infusion, this unit gains +{shield}[shield/], [abilityblue]Resurgence[/abilityblue] and can carry {charges} additional [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges.[/abilityblue]
该单位通过精华灌注获得 +{shield}[shield/] 和[abilityblue]复苏[/abilityblue]，并且还可额外携带 {charges} 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。

Release select Es'Teq minds from their millennia-long slumber and reincarnate them into your colonies, to the enjoyment of your people.[br/][br/]All colonies gain +{happiness}[happiness/] and the colonist acquisition threshold is reduced by {colonistThreshold}%.
将选中的沉睡了千年的埃斯特克灵魂释放出来，使他们在你的殖民地中再生，让人民沉浸在享受之中。[br/][br/]所有殖民地获得 +{happiness}[happiness/]，移住民获取阈值减少 {colonistThreshold}%。
Release the ancient Es'Teq minds and commence the Final Rapture.
释放古老的埃斯特克灵魂，开启“终极狂欢”。
Final Rapture is the name of the Heritor Doomsday weapon.
In combat, one non-Heritor player unit has a {Strength}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to be [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] each [turn/]
在战斗中，每 [turn/] 就会有一个非继承者玩家单位有 {Strength}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率陷入[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]
{Chance}% chance to transform {popAmount} into a Drained each [turn/]
每 [turn/] 有 {Chance}% 几率将 {popAmount} 转化为枯萎者。
Heritor player units gain full [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] at the start of combat.
在战斗开始时，继承者玩家单位将获得最大数量的 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。

Unleash recently freed Es'Teq minds on a non-Heritor enemy colony, infiltrating the minds of their colonists and attempting to take over their physical form through Es'Teq reincarnation for {INT_duration}[turn/]. This ability becomes stronger the more Essence Spires you build.
向一个非继承者敌人殖民地释放刚刚获得自由的埃斯特克灵魂，渗透敌方移住民的思想，并通过埃斯特克再生尝试控制移住民的肉体，持续 {INT_duration}[turn/]。建造的精华尖塔数量越多，此技能就越强大。
We were successful in penetrating the enemy colony's defenses! Our Es'Teq minds are now infiltrating the minds of their colonists.
我们成功渗透了敌方殖民地的防御！我们的埃斯特克灵魂正在渗透敌方移住民的思想。
We were unsuccesful in penetrating the enemy colony's defenses. Our Es'Teq minds have been purged by the enemy, and are now lost forever.
我们未能成功渗透敌方殖民地的防御。我们的埃斯特克灵魂被敌人消灭了，永远也无法再生。
The enemy has launched Es'Teq minds to infiltrate our colonists! We will need to purge them from our colony and secure our defenses.
敌人释放了埃斯特克灵魂想要渗透我们的移住民！我们需要将灵魂从殖民地中清除，守住我们的防线。
Our defenses have successfully averted an infiltration of Es'Teq minds launched against our colony.
我们的防御成功阻止了埃斯特克的灵魂入侵我们的殖民地。

The Essence Spire unlocks the Mind Rebirth Doomsday Weapon. Each additional Essence Spire that you build increases the level of the weapon, making it stronger.[br/][br/]Only one Essence Spire may be built per colony.
精华尖塔可以解锁末日武器“灵魂重生”。每额外建造一个精华尖塔，该武器就会升级并变得更加强大。[br/][br/]每个殖民地只能建造一个精华尖塔。
The final step in the Heritor plan starts the Mind Transference across the whole planet, starting the Final Rapture.[br/][br/]Requires Mind Rebirth Level 3.[br/]
继承者计划的最后一步就是在整个星球上开始灵魂转移，开启“终极狂欢”。[br/][br/]需要“灵魂重生”达到等级 3。[br/]

Our Mind Transference is now fully powered! Es'Teq Minds are roaming free over the planet, infiltrating and dominating the minds of our enemies. It is only a matter of time before we dominate this planet and emerge victorious!
我们的灵魂转移已经全力启动了！埃斯特克的灵魂自由地在这个星球上游荡，渗透并支配着我们敌人的思想。我们统治这个星球并取得胜利只是时间问题！
A Player has started the Final Rapture!
一名玩家开启了“终极狂欢”！
One of our Essence Spires has been captured!
我们的一座精华尖塔已被夺走！
You have lost an Essence Spire!
你失去了一座精华尖塔！
You have lost an Essence Spire. Our attempt at Final Rapture for our Es'Teq brothers and sisters has been canceled!
你失去了一座精华尖塔，我们为埃斯特克的兄弟姐妹开启“终极狂欢”的尝试被阻止了！
{STR_Player} has lost an Essence Spire. Their attempt at Final Rapture has been foiled!
{STR_Player}失去了一座精华尖塔。他们开启“终极狂欢”的计划也被挫败了！
By building an Essence Spire, {playerName} now has access to their Doomsday Weapon, Final Rapture. It is weak now, but will become more powerful as more Essence Spires are constructed.
{playerName}通过建造精华尖塔，现在可以使用末日武器“终极狂欢”了。虽然目前武器威力尚弱，但会随精华尖塔数量的增多而变强。
By building a second Essence Spire, {playerName} has strengthened their Doomsday Weapon, Final Rapture. You should plan raids to destroy these structures before they become too powerful.
{playerName}通过建造第二座精华尖塔强化了“终极狂欢”末日武器。你应当在这些建筑变得过于强大之前策划突袭并将其摧毁。

By building their final Essence Spire, {playerName} has maximized the strength of their Doomsday Weapon, Final Rapture. They are now close to unleashing it and winning the game. The time to strike is now!
{playerName}通过建造最后一座精华尖塔使“终极狂欢”末日武器达到了最强的威力。该玩家马上就可以完全释放其力量来获得游戏胜利了。发动袭击就趁现在！
An Essence Spire has been captured! If it is destroyed, our Doomsday Timer will be canceled. If you recapture the Spire, you will be able to resume the countdown.
一座精华尖塔已被夺走！如果精华尖塔被摧毁，末日计时器将会停止。如果你重新夺回精华尖塔，计时器将会恢复。
An Essence Spire has been captured! If it is destroyed, the Doomsday Timer will be canceled. If {playerName} recaptures the Spire, they will be able to resume the countdown.
一座精华尖塔已被夺走！如果精华尖塔被摧毁，末日计时器将会停止。如果{playerName}重新夺回精华尖塔，计时器将会恢复。
The Doomsday Timer has been paused! You must reclaim the lost Essence Spire, or you will lose your chance at unleashing Final Rapture upon your enemies!
末日武器计时器已暂停！你需要夺回失去的精华尖塔，否则你将失去向敌人释放“终极狂欢”的机会！
The loss of an Essence Spire has canceled the Final Rapture, ending the Doomsday Timer.
精华尖塔的丢失致使“终极狂欢”被取消，末日武器计时器也停止了运转。
The loss of an Essence Spire has weakened our Final Rapture and your Doomsday operations have been canceled.
精华尖塔的丢失削弱了“终极狂欢”的威力，你的末日行动遭到中止。

Our enemies have activated their Doomsday Weapon! The Final Rapture is occuring everywhere across the planet, and your own Doomsday Weapon has been wiped out by the cataclysm. You have {numTurns} to destroy one of their Essence Spires or they will win the game.
敌人激活了他们的末日武器，“终极狂欢”已经遍布全球。你的末日武器已在这场浩劫中被摧毁。你需要在 {numTurns} 内摧毁敌人的一座精华尖塔，否则他们将获得游戏胜利。
The Final Rapture is active, and you will win in {numTurns} unless you lose one of your Essence Spires.
“终极狂欢”已激活，只要不失去任何精华尖塔，你将在 {numTurns} 后获胜。
The Final Rapture is ongoing, and {playerName} will win in {numTurns} unless you can destroy one of their Essence Spires.
“终极狂欢”已激活，{playerName}将在 {numTurns} 后获胜，除非你能在此之前摧毁其一座精华尖塔。
{playerName} is priming their Final Rapture Doomsday Weapon. If they are allowed to finish, your own Doomsday Weapon will be wiped out, and {playerName} will be but one step away from total victory!
{playerName}正在准备释放“终极狂欢”末日武器。如果成功释放，你的末日武器将被摧毁，{playerName}距离胜利也将仅剩一步之遥！
You have successfully completed the Final Rapture.[br/]The minds of all ancient Es'Teq brothers and sisters have been set free and reincarnated in the vessels unwillingly provided by our enemies.
你成功完成了“终极狂欢”。[br/]所有埃斯特克兄弟姐妹们的古代灵魂获得了自由，并在我们敌人的身体中获得了再生。
Our army has been attacked by the Es'Teq. Our units have taken damage and are weakened against entropy attacks.
我们的军队受到了埃斯特克人的攻击，我们的单位受到了伤害，并且更容易受到混沌攻击的伤害。
Es'Teq minds are haunting our colonies like wraiths! Our population is less productive and the colony's general happiness is suffering.
埃斯特克的灵魂像幽灵一样纠缠着我们的殖民地！我们人口生产力变低了，殖民地内的总体幸福值也受到了影响。
Es'Teq minds tried to infiltrate our colonies, but were unsuccessful. The attempt has left our population in a state of civil unrest.
埃斯特克灵魂试图渗入我们的殖民地，但并未成功。不过这次尝试造成了居民的不安。

A powerful blast of entropy has attacked our colony, converting some of our colonists into horrible [abilityred]Drained[/abilityred] creatures. The attack has caused an [abilityred]Essence Gash[/abilityred] to form in the sector.
一股强大的混沌冲击波袭击了我们的殖民地，并将我们的一些移住民变成了可怕的[abilityred]枯萎者[/abilityred]。这次袭击还在区域中制造了一道[abilityred]精华裂缝[/abilityred]。
An attempt was made to attack one of our colonies with a powerful blast of Entropy. We were able to thwart the attack, though the attempt has left our colony in a state of civil unrest.
敌人试图用强大的混沌冲击波攻击我们的殖民地。虽然我们成功挫败了这次袭击，但这次尝试还是造成了殖民地居民的不安。
This unit is capable of carrying {Charges} additional [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] per stack.
该单位每层能额外携带 {Charges} 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。
Essence Charges are like 'lifeforce' that is stolen from enemies. These Essence Charges can be spent as a resource for some abilities. {Charges} is always 1.
This unit can connect to {links} units with [abilityblue]Communion[/abilityblue].
该单位可通过[abilityblue]通灵[/abilityblue]与最多 {links} 个单位连接。

All ranged attacks made by the unit now have a {EnergyDrainChance}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Energy Drain[/abilityred] ({EnergyDrainSingleAttack}[strengthentropy/] strength chance on repeating attacks). On success, the caster gains an [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue], increasing damage.

该单位进行的所有远程攻击都有 {EnergyDrainChance}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率施加[abilityred]能量干涸[/abilityred]（重复攻击有 {EnergyDrainSingleAttack}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率）。如果成功，施法者获得一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]并提升伤害。
Energy Drain is the status effect associated with draining the lifeforce from an enemy and giving it to yourself. They get 'Energy Drain' and you get 'Essence Charge'

Consumes all [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue], bringing the unit into a state of supreme focus, granting them {Accuracy}%[accuracy/] for {turns}[turn/] per [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] consumed.
消耗所有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，使该单位处于高度集中的状态，每消耗一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，可获得 {Accuracy}%[accuracy/]，持续 {turns}[turn/]。
Any mention of Essence is regarding to using the 'lifeforce' mentioned previously

Consumes all [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue]. The unit forms a barrier around themselves and all adjacent hexes, the unit and all allies within the barrier gain +{shield}[shield/] per [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] consumed to create the barrier. After using this ability, the unit goes into Defense Mode.
消耗所有 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。该单位在自身及所有相邻单元格附近生成一道屏障，每消耗一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，屏障内的该单位及所有盟友获得 +{shield}[shield/]。使用此技能后，单位将进入防御模式。

This unit gains {morale}[happiness/] for each [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] it carries.[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of Incarnation can be active at any time.[/productioncol]
每携带一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，该单位获得 {morale}[happiness/]。[br/][br/][productioncol]同时只能激活一种化身。[/productioncol]
This unit gains {morale}[happiness/] for each [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] it carries.
该单位每携带一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，就能获得 {morale}[happiness/]。

Target unit has a {strength}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to gain {EntropyStackAmount} stacks of [abilityred]Energy Drain[/abilityred], and the caster gains {buffstacks} stacks of [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue]. This always succeeds against friendly targets.
目标单位有 {strength}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率获得 {EntropyStackAmount} 层[abilityred]能量干涸[/abilityred]，施法者获得 {buffstacks} 层 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。以友方为目标时必定成功。

The Drained gains +{Damage}[damageentropy/] to their attacks for each [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] they have active. Additionally, their Mind Possession ability is upgraded to Mind Dominance, which works on tier III units.
枯萎者每激活一个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]，攻击力提升 {Damage}[damageentropy/]。此外，枯萎者的“心灵占据”技能将升级为“心灵支配”，可对 3 阶单位生效。

{MindPossessionChance}[strengthentropy/] strength chance to [abilityred]Mind Control[/abilityred] target enemy non-Mindless, non-hero, tier I, II or III unit. On failure, the unit is [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {StunDuration}[turn/] instead.
有 {MindPossessionChance}[strengthentropy/] 力量几率对目标非无意识、非英雄、1 阶、2 阶或 3 阶敌方单位施加[abilityred]心灵控制[/abilityred]。如果失败，该敌方单位将被[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]，持续 {StunDuration}[turn/]。
[abilityblue]Communion[/abilityblue] can now link with up to {units} units.
[abilityblue]通灵[/abilityblue]现在连接最多 {units} 个单位。
Connects all units that are in the same army stack to the Quintessence Ark.
将同一个军队小组中的所有单位与精髓方舟连接。
Whenever this unit gains an [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue], they heal for {health}[hp/].
该单位获得 [abilityblue][essencecharge/] 精华充能[/abilityblue]时治疗 {health}[hp/]。
Tithe as in the taxes levied by religion in the middle ages.

The unit reaches out and forcibly takes the [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charges[/abilityblue] from target unit. All [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue] from the target unit are transferred to the caster. This ability does not work on other Lords.
单位强行汲取目标的 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。目标单位所有的 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]转移至施法者。该技能对其他领主无效。
Lord in this case is refering to the 'High Lord' unit as well as units with the 'Lord Incarnation' mod active.
Reveals the location of the nearest Anomalous Site to the target colony.
显示离目标殖民地距离最近的异常地点。
Anomalous Sites are archeological dig sites in the world, added in this DLC.
Using ancient Es'Teq technology, unique archeological signatures have been detected that could indicate potential anomalous sites.
使用古老的埃斯特克科技侦测到了独特的考古信号，显示出了可能的异常地点。
A new Anomalous Site has been found!
No new Anomalous Sites have been found.
On failure, only deals {FailureDamage}% of current [hp/] and does not debuff [defenseentropy/].
如果失败，只能造成当前 [hp/] {FailureDamage}% 的伤害，并且不会造成 [defenseentropy/] 减益。
We have failed to successfully curse the enemy army. They have taken only minor damage.
我们未能成功诅咒敌军，他们只受到了轻微伤害。
We have successfully thwarted an attack on one of our armies. They have taken only minor damage.
我们成功挫败了敌人对我们的进攻，他们只受到了轻微的伤害。
Our Siphon Priests have successfully infiltrated the enemy colony and are working on converting their colonists.
我们的虹吸牧师成功渗透进了敌人的殖民地，并在努力转化他们的移住民。
Our Siphon Priests have failed to infiltrate the enemy colony, though the attempt has caused a state of civil unrest.
我们的虹吸牧师未能渗透进敌人的殖民地，但这次尝试造成了居民的不安。
Hostile Siphon Priests have infiltrated one of our colonies and are at work converting our colonists!
敌方虹吸牧师渗透进了我们的一个殖民地，并在转化我们的移住民！
We have caught Siphon Priests attempting to infiltrate one of our colonies. Although we have apprehended them, the attempt has caused a state of civil unrest.
我们发现敌人的虹吸牧师正试图渗透我们的殖民地。虽然我们阻止了他们，但这次尝试造成了居民的不安。
{EntropicDecayChance}[strengthEntropy/] strength chance to apply [abilityred]Entropic Decay[/abilityred] to Mechanical units for {durationEntropicDecay}[turn/]
有 {EntropicDecayChance}[strengthEntropy/] 力量几率对机械单位施加[abilityred]混沌衰败[/abilityred]，持续 {durationEntropicDecay}[turn/]。
Entropic decay is a status effect associated with the Entropy damage channel, that deals damage over time.

By giving your people space to focus and commune with the Essence within them, they become more susceptible to receiving the bounty that Essence has to offer.[br/][br/]All units can carry {EssenceChargeIncrease} additional [abilityblue][essencecharge/]Essence Charge[/abilityblue].
给予你的人民足够的空间集中精力与他们内心的精华通灵，使他们变得更容易接受精华提供的恩惠。[br/][br/]所有单位可额外携带 {EssenceChargeIncrease} 个 [abilityblue][essencecharge/]精华充能[/abilityblue]。
Sanctorum refers to the landmark structure from the Heritor

Using ancient rites, reawaken the ancient tombs of the Heritor and use it to learn from the history of the Es'Teq. [br/][br/]Heritor tech is {ResearchReduction} cheaper to research, and Heritor units cost {EnergyReduction} less [energy/] to produce.[br/][br/][orange]Can only be used by Heritor commanders[/orange]
举行远古仪式，重新唤醒继承者的古墓并以此研究埃斯特克的历史。[br/][br/]继承者科技的研究消耗降低 {ResearchReduction}，生产继承者单位所需的 [energy/] 消耗降低 {EnergyReduction}。[br/][br/][orange]仅限继承者指挥官使用[/orange]
Heritor tech refers to the research unlocks of the Heritor
继承者单位 [energy/] 消耗减少 {EnergyReduction}

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
